mapper.select: SELECT fr.id as id, fr.template_name as template_name, fr.spu_location as spu_location, fr.delivery_deadline as delivery_deadline, fr.default_first_num as default_first_num, fr.default_first_money as default_first_money, fr.default_continue_num as default_continue_num, fr.default_continue_money as default_continue_money, fr.gmt_create as gmt_create, fr.gmt_update as gmt_update FROM unimall_freight_template fr, unimall_sku sk, unimall_spu sp WHERE sp.freight_template_id = fr.id and sk.spu_id = sp.id and sk.id = #{skuId}
